text: The 1976 North Texas State Mean Green football team represented North Texas State University—now known as the University of North Texas—during the 1976 NCAA Division I-A football season. In its fourth season under head coach Hayden Fry, the team compiled a 7–4 record. The team played its home games at Fouts Field in Denton, Texas. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==Game summaries== ===at Mississippi State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 0–5 | 1975 | L 12–15 |} ===at Texas=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | colspan=3| First meeting |} ===vs. SMU=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1–19–1 | 1974 | L 6–7 |} ===Florida State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | colspan=3| First meeting |} ==References== North Texas State Category:North Texas Mean Green football seasons North Texas State Football
